tool_description: Read thousands of book reviews by your friends and other Goodreads members.
name: Goodreads
title: Goodreads

api_list.name: addBookToShelf
api_list.description: Add a book to a shelf.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: bookId
required_parameters.description: Id of the book to add to the shelf.

api_list.name: GetlistopiasByBookId
api_list.description: Get the listopia lists for a given book.Version of list/book.

api_list.name: addBooksToMultipleShelves
api_list.description: Add a list of books to many current user's shelves.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: booksIds
required_parameters.description: Ids of the books to add to the shelf.

api_list.name: addFriend
api_list.description: Sends a friend request to a user. You'll need to register your app (required).

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret

api_list.name: addQuote
api_list.description: If you don't specify an author_id, it will try to look one up based on the author_name you provide. You'll need to register your app (required).

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

optional_parameters.name: bookId
optional_parameters.description: Id of the book from which the quote was taken.

optional_parameters.name: isbn
optional_parameters.description: ISBN of the book from which the quote was taken. This will not override the book_id if it was provide.

api_list.description: Get a response with stats comparing your books to another member's.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

api_list.name: createComment
api_list.description: Creates a new comment. You'll need to register your app (required).

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The title of the book to lookup.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: resourceId

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret

api_list.name: createReview
api_list.description: Add book reviews for members. You'll need to register your app (required).

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

api_list.name: createTopic
api_list.description: Create a new topic.

required_parameters.name: subjectType
required_parameters.description: Either 'Book' or 'Group'. If 'Book', the book the topic is about. If 'Group', the group that the topic belongs to.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: bodyUsertext
required_parameters.description: The text of the comment that starts the topic thread. Can include Goodreads book/author tags of the form [book:Title|ID]

required_parameters.name: subjectId
required_parameters.description: The id for the subject the topic belongs to, either bookId or groupId, as appropriate.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

optional_parameters.name: updateFeed
optional_parameters.description: Indicates whether the comment for the new topic should be added to the user`s update feed. To enable, set to `on`; otherwise, default is not to add to update feed.

optional_parameters.name: questionFlag
optional_parameters.description: Indicates whether the topic is a discussion question ('true') or not ('false'). Default is false (non-question).

optional_parameters.name: folderId
optional_parameters.description: If the subject is a group, you can supply a folder id to add the topic to. Be sure that the folder belongs to the group. By default, if the subject_type is 'Group', then the topic will be added to the 'general' folder.

optional_parameters.name: digest
optional_parameters.description: Indicates whether the user would like to receive an email when someone replies to the topic (user will get one email only). To enable, set to 'on'; otherwise, default is not to add to update feed.

api_list.name: declineFriendRequest
api_list.description: Decline a friend request for the current user. You'll need to register your app (required).

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: ownedBookId
required_parameters.description: ownedBookId is a unique identifier for the owned book (not a book_id).

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.description: The oauthTokenSecret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

api_list.name: getAuthorBooks
api_list.description: Get a response with a paginated list of an authors books.

api_list.name: getAuthorByName
api_list.description: Get an response with the Goodreads url for the given author name.

api_list.description: Get a response describing the association between a user and an author.

required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

api_list.name: getAuthorInfo
api_list.description: Get a response with info about an author.

api_list.description: Get an response with the Goodreads user_id for the user who authorized access.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

api_list.name: getBookIdByISBNs
api_list.description: Get Goodreads book IDs given one or more ISBNs. Response contains IDs without any markup.

required_parameters.name: isbn
required_parameters.description: ISBNs of books to look up.

api_list.name: getBookReview
api_list.description: Get a response that contains embed code for the iframe reviews widget. The reviews widget shows an excerpt (first 300 characters) of the most popular reviews of a book for a given internal Goodreads book_id. Reviews of all known editions of the book are included.

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: Show only reviews with a particular rating.

optional_parameters.name: textOnly
optional_parameters.description: Only show reviews that have text (default false).

api_list.name: getBookReviewsByISBN
api_list.description: Get a response that contains embed code for the iframe reviews widget that shows excerpts (first 300 characters) of the most popular reviews of a book for a given ISBN. The reviews are from all known editions of the book.

required_parameters.name: isbn
required_parameters.description: The ISBN of the book to lookup.

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: Show only reviews with a particular rating.

api_list.name: getListOwnedBooksByUserId
api_list.description: List books owned by a user.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Which page of results to show (default 1).

api_list.name: getBookReviewsByTitle
api_list.description: Get a response that contains embed code for the iframe reviews widget, which shows an excerpt (first 300 characters) of the most popular reviews of a book for a given title/author. The book shown will be the most popular book that matches all the keywords in the input string. The reviews are from all known editions of the book.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: The title of the book to lookup.

required_parameters.name: authorName
required_parameters.description: The author name of the book to lookup.

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: Show only reviews with a particular rating.

api_list.name: getBooksByMultipleFields
api_list.description: Get a response with the most popular books for the given query. This will search all books in the title/author/ISBN fields and show matches, sorted by popularity on Goodreads. There will be cases where a result is shown on the Goodreads site, but not through the API. This happens when the result is an Amazon-only edition and we have to honor Amazon's terms of service.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: Title of the book.Supports boolean operators and phrase searching.

required_parameters.name: isbn
required_parameters.description: ISBN fields.Supports boolean operators and phrase searching.

required_parameters.name: authorName
required_parameters.description: Author of the book.Supports boolean operators and phrase searching.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Which page of results to show (default 1).

api_list.name: getBooksOnMembersShelf
api_list.description: Get the books on a members shelf. Customize the feed with the below variables. Viewing members with profiles who have set them as visible to members only or just their friends.

required_parameters.name: variable
required_parameters.description: Customize the feed with the below variables.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Which page of results to show (default 1).

optional_parameters.name: searchQuery
optional_parameters.description: Query text to match against member's books.

api_list.description: Creates a new comment. You'll need to register your app (required).

required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

optional_parameters.name: page

api_list.name: getEventsInYourArea
api_list.description: Shows events nearby the authenticating user or you can get a list of events near a location by passing lat/lng coordinates.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: The author name of the book to lookup. This is optional, but is recommended for accuracy.

api_list.name: getFriendRequests
api_list.description: Returns a response with the current user's friend requests. You'll need to register your app (required).

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page: 1-N page of results to show (default 1).

api_list.name: getFriendUpdates
api_list.description: Get your friend updates (the same data you see on your homepage).

required_parameters.name: accessTokenSecret
required_parameters.description: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

optional_parameters.name: updateFilter
optional_parameters.description: Which updates to show. Options are: friends (default - includes followers), following, top_friends.

optional_parameters.name: updateType
optional_parameters.description: :Type of update. Valid values are: books, reviews, statuses. (default all)

api_list.name: getGroup
api_list.description: Get info about a group by id.

api_list.name: getGroupBySearchQuery
api_list.description: Search group titles and descriptions for the given string.

required_parameters.name: searchQuery
required_parameters.description: Which page of results to show (default 1).

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Which page of results to show (default 1).

api_list.name: getGroupMembers
api_list.description: Returns a response list of members of the group.

required_parameters.name: groupId
required_parameters.description: Goodreads group id of the group.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Which page of results to show (default 1).

optional_parameters.name: listOfNames
optional_parameters.description: List of names to search for. Optional, will find all members by default.

api_list.name: getListTopicsByGroupFolder
api_list.description: Returns a list of topics in a group's folder specified either by group id.

required_parameters.name: groupId
required_parameters.description: If supplied and id is set to 0, then will return topics from the general folder for the group indicated by.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Which page of results to show (default 1).

optional_parameters.name: folderId
optional_parameters.description: If id is non-zero, this param is ignored. Note: may return 404 if there are no topics in the general folder for the specified group.

api_list.name: getReviewStatisticsByISBNs
api_list.description: Get review statistics for books given a list of ISBNs.You can mix ISBN10s and ISBN13s, but you'll receive a 422 error if you don't specify any, and you'll receive a 404 if none are found.

required_parameters.name: isbns

optional_parameters.description: Indicates whether to show topics user has viewed before or not. Default is to include all topics; set this param to 'true' or '1' to restrict to only topics the user has already viewed.

optional_parameters.description: Which page of results to show (default 1).
